original_text: He shall tear it open by its wings, but shall not sever it completely. And the priest shall burn it on the altar, on the wood that is on the fire. It is a burnt offering, a food offering with a pleasing aroma to the Lord.
korean_text: 또 그 날개 자리에서 그 몸을 찢되 아주 찢지 말고 제사장이 그것을 제단 위의 불 위에 있는 나무 위에서 불살라 번제를 드릴지니 이는 화제라 여호와께 향기로운 냄새니라

sentences.original_text: He shall tear it open by its wings
but shall not sever it completely
And the priest shall burn it on the altar
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 제사장은 그것을 제단 위에서 불사를 것입니다

sentences.original_text: on the wood that is on the fire
with a pleasing aroma to the Lord
